pullRequest.title: [TE] Creating a thirdeye-dashboard module to host the dashboard server
pullRequest.bodyText:
Module refactor changes

Moved org.apache.pinot.thirdeye.dashboard from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard
Moved all test code from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard
Moved config files from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard
Module thirdeye-pinot no longer builds a shaded jar.
The dashboard module builds a shaded jar.
The launcher scripts now point to the dashboard module

This is a BREAKING change.
The change is as per the new Module architecture doc shared on the thirdeye slack.
At a later stage, the more modular unit tests will be refactored to colocate them with their respective classes. This is because, currently there are a lot of tests which use a lot to classes to run thereby behaving more like integration tests as opposed to unit tests. It might be worth considering having a thirdeye-integration-tests module for these cases.

beforeCommit.message:
[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Updated poms. Moved shaded jar to dashboard module

afterCommit.message:
[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Updated poms. Moved shaded jar to dashboard module

nodes.bodyText: Per our discussion, we are going to publish shaded JAR and source JAR together. We should only remove this plugin once we have both JAR build.

commit.message:
[TE] Moved Resource classes to a new module thirdeye-dashboard

Project compiles. Tests do not compile.

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Some of the tests can be moved back. However, doing a blanket move in the interest of time. The test code contains a lot of dependencies on the UI code and therefore spliting it out will involve some effort.

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Updated poms. Moved shaded jar to dashboard module

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Moving thirdeye-pinot/config/ to thirdeye-dashboard

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Altering bash scripts to load from the dashboard module instead of thirdeye-pinot
